'''Leuca''' is an open-world [[NPC]] located at the most north-eastern point of [[Elynas]], [[Beryl Region]], [[Fontaine]]. She can be found talking to [[Mela]].

===Appearance===
Leuca is a blue and pink melusine with blonde hair and brown eyes. She wears a sleeveless brown dress.

===Etymology===
* Leuca is likely named after the Greek nymph {{w|Leuce (mythology)|Leuce}}.
* Leuca {{lang|grc=Λευκά}} comes from the Greek {{lang|grc=λευκός}}, meaning "white".
